title: Comparative Education on Linear vs. Branching Computer Tutorials for Improving Radiographic Image Interpretation Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of radiographic imaging and foundational knowledge of anatomy
context.additional_context: Considering smartphone-based learning environments, combining in-person sessions with online tutorials

learning_goals: Learners can identify key anatomical structures in cervical spine radiographs with 85% accuracy
Learners can detect and classify five or more common abnormal findings in radiographic images
Learners can select a suitable learning strategy (linear/branching tutorial) with over 70% engagement

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
